edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.http

Class UniversalHttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.http.UniversalHttpClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSClientInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UniversalHttpClientExtended

    public class UniversalHttpClient
extends Object
implements edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSClientInterface
    This class defines a UniversalHttpClient to communicate with a GNS instance over HTTP. This class works on both Android and Desktop platforms. This class contains a subset of all available server operations. For a more complete set see UniversalGnsClientExtended.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Emmanuel Cecchet

      If field is a GeoSpatial field returns all guids that have fields that are near value which is a point specified as a two element JSONArray: [LONG, LAT].

      Selects all records that match query.

      Set up a context aware group guid using a query.
      org.json.JSONArray selectWithin(String field, org.json.JSONArray value)
      If field is a GeoSpatial field returns all guids that have fields that are within value which is a bounding box specified as a nested JSONArrays of paired tuples: [[LONG_UL, LAT_UL],[LONG_BR, LAT_BR]]

      • accountGuidCreate

        public GuidEntry accountGuidCreate(String alias,
                                   String password)
                            throws Exception
        Register a new account guid with the corresponding alias on the GNS server. This generates a new guid and a public / private key pair. Returns a GuidEntry for the new account which contains all of this information.
        Specified by:
        accountGuidCreate in interface edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSClientInterface
        Parameters:
        alias - - a human readable alias to the guid - usually an email address
        password - - a required password argument used as a failsafe accessor for the account
        Returns:
        Throws:
        Exception

      • guidGetGroups

        public org.json.JSONArray guidGetGroups(String groupGuid,
                                        GuidEntry reader)
                                 throws IOException,
                                        edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.exceptions.client.ClientException,
                                        edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.exceptions.client.InvalidGuidException
        Return a list of the groups that the guid is a member of. Signs the query using the private key of the user associated with the guid.
        Parameters:
        groupGuid - the guid of the group to lookup
        reader - the guid of the entity doing the lookup
        Returns:
        the list of groups as a JSONArray
        Throws:
        IOException - if a communication error occurs
        edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.exceptions.client.ClientException - if a protocol error occurs or the list cannot be parsed
        edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.exceptions.client.InvalidGuidException - if the group guid is invalid

      • groupAddMembershipUpdatePermission

        public void groupAddMembershipUpdatePermission(GuidEntry groupGuid,
                                               String guidToAuthorize)
                                        throws Exception
        Authorize guidToAuthorize to add/remove members from the group groupGuid. If guidToAuthorize is null, everyone is authorized to add/remove members to the group. Note that this method can only be called by the group owner (private key required) Signs the query using the private key of the group owner.
        Parameters:
        groupGuid - the group GUID entry
        guidToAuthorize - the guid to authorize to manipulate group membership or null for anyone
        Throws:
        Exception

      • groupRemoveMembershipUpdatePermission

        public void groupRemoveMembershipUpdatePermission(GuidEntry groupGuid,
                                                  String guidToUnauthorize)
                                           throws Exception
        Unauthorize guidToUnauthorize to add/remove members from the group groupGuid. If guidToUnauthorize is null, everyone is forbidden to add/remove members to the group. Note that this method can only be called by the group owner (private key required). Signs the query using the private key of the group owner.
        Parameters:
        groupGuid - the group GUID entry
        guidToUnauthorize - the guid to authorize to manipulate group membership or null for anyone
        Throws:
        Exception

      • groupAddMembershipReadPermission

        public void groupAddMembershipReadPermission(GuidEntry groupGuid,
                                             String guidToAuthorize)
                                      throws Exception
        Authorize guidToAuthorize to get the membership list from the group groupGuid. If guidToAuthorize is null, everyone is authorized to list members of the group. Note that this method can only be called by the group owner (private key required). Signs the query using the private key of the group owner.
        Parameters:
        groupGuid - the group GUID entry
        guidToAuthorize - the guid to authorize to manipulate group membership or null for anyone
        Throws:
        Exception

      • groupRemoveMembershipReadPermission

        public void groupRemoveMembershipReadPermission(GuidEntry groupGuid,
                                                String guidToUnauthorize)
                                         throws Exception
        Unauthorize guidToUnauthorize to get the membership list from the group groupGuid. If guidToUnauthorize is null, everyone is forbidden from querying the group membership. Note that this method can only be called by the group owner (private key required). Signs the query using the private key of the group owner.
        Parameters:
        groupGuid - the group GUID entry
        guidToUnauthorize - the guid to authorize to manipulate group membership or null for anyone
        Throws:
        Exception

      • aclAdd

        public void aclAdd(edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.AclAccessType accessType,
                   GuidEntry targetGuid,
                   String field,
                   String accesserGuid)
            throws Exception
        Adds to an access control list of the given field. The accesser can be a guid of a user or a group guid or null which means anyone can access the field. The field can be also be +ALL+ which means all fields can be read by the reader. Signs the query using the private key of the user associated with the guid.
        Parameters:
        accessType - a value from GnrsProtocol.AclAccessType
        targetGuid - guid of the field to be modified
        field - field name
        accesserGuid - guid to add to the ACL
        Throws:
        Exception
        edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.exceptions.client.ClientException - if the query is not accepted by the server.

      • aclRemove

        public void aclRemove(edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.AclAccessType accessType,
                      GuidEntry guid,
                      String field,
                      String accesserGuid)
               throws Exception
        Removes a GUID from an access control list of the given user's field on the GNS server to include the guid specified in the accesser param. The accesser can be a guid of a user or a group guid or null which means anyone can access the field. The field can be also be +ALL+ which means all fields can be read by the reader. Signs the query using the private key of the user associated with the guid.
        Parameters:
        accessType -
        guid -
        field -
        accesserGuid -
        Throws:
        Exception
        edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.exceptions.client.ClientException - if the query is not accepted by the server.

      • aclGet

        public org.json.JSONArray aclGet(edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.AclAccessType accessType,
                                 GuidEntry guid,
                                 String field,
                                 String accesserGuid)
                          throws Exception
        Get an access control list of the given user's field on the GNS server to include the guid specified in the accesser param. The accesser can be a guid of a user or a group guid or null which means anyone can access the field. The field can be also be +ALL+ which means all fields can be read by the reader. Signs the query using the private key of the user associated with the guid.
        Parameters:
        accessType -
        guid -
        field -
        accesserGuid -
        Returns:
        list of GUIDs for that ACL
        Throws:
        Exception
        edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.exceptions.client.ClientException - if the query is not accepted by the server.

      • fieldRead

        public org.json.JSONArray fieldRead(String guid,
                                    String field,
                                    GuidEntry reader)
                             throws Exception
        Reads all the values value for a key from the GNS server for the given guid. The guid of the user attempting access is also needed. Signs the query using the private key of the user associated with the reader guid (unsigned if reader is null).
        Parameters:
        guid -
        field -
        reader - if null the field must be readable for all
        Returns:
        a JSONArray containing the values in the field
        Throws:
        Exception

      • select

        public org.json.JSONArray select(String field,
                                 String value)
                          throws Exception
        Returns all GUIDs that have a field that contains the given value as a JSONArray containing guids. Also note that the GNS currently does not enforce any ACL checking for this operation - everything is accessible and no signatures are required. This might change.
        Parameters:
        field -
        value -
        Returns:
        a JSONArray containing all the matched records as JSONObjects
        Throws:
        Exception

      • selectWithin

        public org.json.JSONArray selectWithin(String field,
                                       org.json.JSONArray value)
                                throws Exception
        If field is a GeoSpatial field returns all guids that have fields that are within value which is a bounding box specified as a nested JSONArrays of paired tuples: [[LONG_UL, LAT_UL],[LONG_BR, LAT_BR]]
        Parameters:
        field -
        value - - [[LONG_UL, LAT_UL],[LONG_BR, LAT_BR]]
        Returns:
        a JSONArray containing the guids of all the matched records
        Throws:
        Exception

      • selectNear

        public org.json.JSONArray selectNear(String field,
                                     org.json.JSONArray value,
                                     Double maxDistance)
                              throws Exception
        If field is a GeoSpatial field returns all guids that have fields that are near value which is a point specified as a two element JSONArray: [LONG, LAT]. Max Distance is in meters.
        Parameters:
        field -
        value - - [LONG, LAT]
        maxDistance - - distance in meters
        Returns:
        a JSONArray containing the guids of all the matched records
        Throws:
        Exception

                                      String targetGuid)
